TABLE.NAME: block_ajax_marking
TABLE.COMMENT: stores user preferences (if any) on which assessments they would like hidden and which groups they would like to display in the AJAX marking block.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: the userid of the person to whom this preference applies

FIELD.NAME: assessmenttype
FIELD.COMMENT: this allows us to know what the next field, assessment id refers to i.e. aquiz, a forum etc.

FIELD.NAME: assessmentid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the assessment (quiz, forum, etc) that this preference refers to

FIELD.NAME: showhide
FIELD.COMMENT: should this assessment be shown at all to this user? 0=no 1=yes default to yes

FIELD.NAME: groups
FIELD.COMMENT: comma separated list of group ids that should be displayed for this assessment and this user.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: primary key of the table, please edit me

KEY.NAME: useridkey
KEY.COMMENT: links userid to the user table
